<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs=""
>
[Wrath of the First Ghoul](/Feats.aspx?ID=3895) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Blood Lords</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Death" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=40" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #184: The Ghouls Hunger](/Sources.aspx?ID=147) pg. 81</row>

**Archetype** [Ghoul](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=178)

**Frequency**
Once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Secret Eater](/Feats.aspx?ID=3890)

</column>

---

The ravenous maggots inside you become capable of exploding forth from your attacks into the wounds of an opponent, whispering telepathic words of destruction that invoke horrific flashbacks of Kabriri's transformation from  <%ANCESTRIES%371%%> elf <%END> to [ghoul](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=52) or psychic images of hundreds of maggots bursting from the victim's flesh all at once. Make a melee Strike against a target creature. If it hits, in addition to taking damage from the Strike, the target is affected by a 10th-level casting of [_power word kill_](/Spells.aspx?ID=227). If Wrath of the First Ghoul is used against a target [elf](/Traits.aspx?ID=58), [Leng ghoul](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1165), or worshipper of [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=14) and does not instantly kill the creature, the target takes double damage.
name: Wrath of the First Ghoul
